# Background

## Chicago 311 Service Requests

* Residents of Chicago can make non-emergency service requests (e.g. trimming trees, animal control) using the city's Chi311 program, by dialing 311, visiting the website, or using the app

* All 311 service requests are publicly available via the Chicago Data Portal, a repository of public data sets, including public health, transit, and policing

## Chicago Community Areas

* The city of Chicago can be divided into 77 distinct neighborhoods called community areas

* Community areas have static boundaries, unlike 

* While community areas don't map directly onto electoral districts, residents strongly identify with their community areas
